info.title: Service for namespace PeopleService
info.description:
This service is located at [http://localhost/People.svc/](http://localhost/People.svc/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](https://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Supplier{bg:orange}],[Supplier]++-0..1[Address],[Supplier]-*>[ProductService.Product{bg:whitesmoke}],[Address],[Person{bg:orange}],[Person]-0..1>[PersonDetail],[Person]^[Customer{bg:orange}],[Person]^[Employee{bg:orange}],[PersonDetail{bg:orange}],[PersonDetail]++-0..1[Address],[PersonDetail]-0..1>[Person],[Suppliers{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Supplier],[People{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Person],[PersonDetails{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[PersonDetail])

### Legend
![Legend](https://yuml.me/diagram/plain;dir:TB;scale:60/class/[External.Type{bg:whitesmoke}],[ComplexType],[EntityType{bg:orange}],[EntitySet/Singleton/Operation{bg:dodgerblue}])

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Suppliers HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
